alert.note: Alert for Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:28PM CDT until April 15 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Scott County in western Arkansas... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Heavener, or 15 miles south of Poteau, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waldron... Mansfield... Beauchamp... Oliver... Morgan Springs... Bates... Black Fork... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... Liberty... Boles... Elm Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
